name: realtime-dashboard
description: Monorepo de desenvolvimento para o Dashboard em Tempo Real.

scripts.install:concurrent: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix server build
scripts.build:client: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix client build
